name: Atomic Shelter
description:
In the wake of an nuclear catastrophe, you find yourself in a derelict atomic shelter. With lethal radiation slowly seeping in, you are forced to venture deeper and deeper into the depths of the long abandoned complex. But, you're not alone down there...

Controls

  • WASD, Mouse, E
  • 1-5 to equip stuff
  • TIP: Just because you see the exit, that doesn't mean there is more you can collect on the current floor.
  • IF YOU'RE PLAYING ON BROWSER MAKE SURE TO MAXIMISE OR YOU CAN'T SEE THE HUD and UI

Items:

  • Gun - shoots stuff!
  • Grenade - explodes stuff!
  • Pizza - makes you jump higher and run faster. Lasts for 10 seconds.
  • Rad Mushroom - reduces radiation levels on the current floor, gives you ~10 more seconds to escape!
  • Revival Idol - instead of going back to the start, you will respawn on the current floor. Gets used up when you die.
